description:
Welcome to this course Risk Analysis in Capital Budgeting.

Every business operates in an environment which does not give you all the information to take right decision. It means, you have to take business decisions that could go wrong. The chance of your decision going wrong is referred as Risk. You cannot altogether eliminate the risk but you can minimize it. This course focuses on Risk Analysis in Capital Budgeting.

In this course, you will learn about

a) Risk, its meaning;

b) Uncertainity;

c) Probabilities;

d) Probability Distribution;

e) Expected Value;

f) Standard Deviation;

g) Risk Adjusted Discount Rate;

h) Certainity Equivalent Factor;

This course will explain the theory and practical aspects of Risk Analysis in Capital Budgeting.

Practical case studies were discussed and analysed indepth.

This is a self paced learning course.

Take this course to understand Risk Analysis in Capital Budgeting in your own pace and convenience.
title: Risk Analysis - Capital Budgeting for CA / CS / CFA exams
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
